Recipe.Title: Oreo Truffles
Recipe.Instructions: Crush oreos and save 1/4 cup for topping. Mix crushed oreos with butter and pat into dish for crust. Mix 2/3 container of Cool Whip with cream cheese. Spread mixture over crust. Mix pudding and milk. Let set until it thickens a little. Spread over cream cheese mixture. Top with remaining Cool Whip. Sprinkle saved oreo crumbs.
